document_data.name: Lilac
document_data.mainbody: The '''lilac''' was a type of flowering plant with a strong scent.
document_data.Habitats:
* Lilac was planted along the [[River Ith]] within the city of [[Darromar]] in [[Tethyr]].
* [[Lilac Pond]], in [[Cormyr]], was named for the flower.
document_data.Trivia: When [[lacerial]]s felt a longing for home, they emitted a scent similar to that of lilacs, and [[Lilac (village)|one of their villages]] was named after the flower.{{Cite living jungle/Inhabitants of the Jungle|13}}
